# [Interview #75: ACOS Signing Report - Erica Sadun, Entry #19](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=75#19)

#### Question

What happens when two people balefire each other simultaneously?

#### Robert Jordan

[disgusted look] A lot of confusion.
